content: चित्त {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [चित्-क्त] {@--1@} Observed, perceived. {@--2@} Considered, reflected or meditated upon. {@--3@} Resolved. {@--4@} Intended, wished, desired. {@--5@} Visible, perceptible. --त्तं {@--1@} Observing, attending. {@--2@} ({%a%}) Thought, thinking, attention; ({%b%}) desire, intention, aim; मच्चित्तः सततं भव <ls>Bg. 18. 57</ls>; अनेकचित्तविभ्रांत <ls n="Bg.">16. 16.</ls> {@--3@} The mind; यदासौ दुर्वारः प्रसरति मदश्चित्तकरिणः <ls>Śānti. 1. 22</ls>; so चलचित्त and comps. below. {@--4@} The heart (considered as the seat of intellect). {@--5@} Reason, intellect, reasoning faculty.
